# Salmon Data Explorer

I made an interactive data explorer for the Juvenile Salmon Program. The data explorer let's you look at annual juvenile salmon migrations dynamics.

![](/post/2019-04-07-juvenile-salmon-data-explorer_files/jsp_de.png)



## Web address
https://hecate.hakai.org/shiny/jsp/

## GitHub Repository

Here's the public repository for the Juvenile Salmon Program Time Series.
Feel free to check it out and read the .pdf for a good summary of four years of observations and findings.
https://github.com/HakaiInstitute/jsp-time-series
